line_1: Tow'rds the black vein a passage cleaves:
line_2: In vain: his daring axe he heaves,

line_1: Where to the palm the jasmin cleaves,
Sheer from the shoulder to the waist he cleaves,
line_2: And of one arm the tott'ring trunk bereaves.

line_1: Its deep foundations his strong trident cleaves,
line_2: And high in air th' up-rooted empire heaves;
